articles.title: Pyongyangites Meet to Congratulate Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Pyongyangites Meet to Congratulate Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- A Pyongyang city rally took place with splendor at Kim Il Sung Square Thursday to congratulate supreme leader Kim Jong Un on his reelection as first chairman of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and Kim Ki Nam and other senior party and state officials, a chairperson of a friendly party, officials of party and power bodies, those of the Cabinet, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, those in the fields of science, education, literature and arts, public health and media and working people and youth and students in Pyongyang City.
					
					 Kim Ki Nam, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, made a congratulatory report there.
					
					 The reporter said that the reelection of Kim Jong Un to the top post of the NDC representing and symbolizing the dignity of the country and tremendous national power made it possible for the DPRK to make a steady dynamic advance and provide a firm guarantee for the eternal prosperity of Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Un, who hewed the path of the arduous Songun revolution together with General Secretary Kim Jong Il in early days, has wisely led the overall revolutionary struggle and construction at the top posts of the party and state over the past two years, performing shining exploits to go down in the history of the country.
					
					 He laid down a new line of simultaneously developing the two fronts as required by the prevailing situation and the developing Korean revolution and has made ceaseless forced marches the way the anti-Japanese guerrillas did, always standing on the forefront for the defence of the country. The independent dignity and ever-victorious spirit of the great Paektusan nation have been fully demonstrated before the whole world in the course of his endless journeys to inspect the front.
					
					 Noting that the dreams and ideals of the Korean people precisely mean realizing the desires of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, Kim Jong Un has ushered in a fresh heyday of prosperity and translated the people's dreams and ideals into realities one by one on this land.
					
					 The reporter called on all the service personnel and people to dynamically advance to successfully realize their beautiful dreams and ideals, single-mindedly united around Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Then congratulatory speeches were made on behalf of workers, agricultural workers, intellectuals, youth and students.
					
					 The speakers extended the highest glory and warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Un and called on all the participants to perform miracles and merits at all posts and work sites.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Hungarian Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Hungarian Ambassador
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, received credentials from Gabor Csaba, Hungarian ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday.
					 After receiving credentials, Kim had a talk with the ambassador.

articles.title: Indonesian Government Cultural Delegation Here
articles.content:
Indonesian Government Cultural Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- An Indonesian government cultural delegation headed by Hari Untoro Dradjat, senior advisor to the minister of Tourism and Creative Economy, arrived here on Thursday to participate in the 16th Kimilsungia Festival.

articles.title: State Academic Degrees, Titles Conferred on Intellectuals
articles.content:
State Academic Degrees, Titles Conferred on Intellectuals
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- State academic degrees and titles were conferred on intellectuals on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The title of academician was awarded to Kim Jong Nam, director of the Hygienic Hospital of the Korean General Red-Cross Hospital, and two others and the title of candidate academician to Jo Jong Do, room chief of Kim Il Sung University, and four others.
					
					 Professorship went to Ri Jun Yong and Jo Chon Gyu, teachers at Kim Il Sung University, Ri Yong Su, rector of Kim Po Hyon University, Kang Il Yong, vice-director of an institute of Kim Chaek University of Technology and five others.
					
					 Doctorate went to Ri Chang Hwan, teacher at Kim Il Sung Higher Party School, Sin Yong Chol, vice dean of Kim Il Sung University, Pak Jae Yon, Mun Myong Hwa and Yang Suk Hui, department heads of the same university and 76 others.
					
					 Assistant professorship was awarded to 100 persons.
					
					 An awarding ceremony took place at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday.

articles.title: Staff Members of Pyongyang Mission of AINDF Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Staff Members of Pyongyang Mission of AINDF Visit Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- Chief Jo Il Min and staff members of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) Thursday visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 They laid bouquets before the graves of Kim Po Hyon and Ri Po Ik, grandparents of the President, and the graves of his parents Kim Hyong Jik and Kang Pan Sok and observed a moment's silence in memory of them.
					
					 Recollecting the revolutionary life of the President at his old home in Mangyongdae, they went round historic relics.
					
					 The chief said:
					
					 Visiting Kim Il Sung's old home in Mangyongdae, I miss him very much.
					
					 He, possessed of broad generosity and magnanimity, led with warm care all people desirous of national reunification to the work to accomplish the patriotic cause.
					
					 The feats he performed for achieving the great national unity and the reunification of the country will shine forever.
					
					 The vanguard fighters of the AINDF and the people in the south will certainly usher in the June 15 new era of independent reunification, holding the respected Marshal Kim Jong Un in high esteem as the lodestar of national reunification.

articles.title: Ministry of People's Armed Forces Holds Celebration Meeting
articles.content:
Ministry of People's Armed Forces Holds Celebration Meeting 
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- A meeting of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces took place on Thursday to warmly congratulate Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un on his reelection as first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 Present there were officials of the ministry.
					
					 A report was followed by speeches at the meeting.
					
					 Reflecting the unanimous minds of all service personnel of the KPA, the reporter and speakers extended the highest glory and warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Un on his reelection as first chairman of the NDC of the DPRK by the unanimous will and desire of the whole party and army and all the people.
					
					 No force on earth can block the advance of the revolutionary armed forces led by Kim Jong Un without parallel in idea and leadership ability, military wisdom and grit and in the revolutionary sense of obligation and virtues and immensely rosy is the future of the DPRK making a leap forward with dynamism, they emphasized.
					
					 They vowed to creditably fulfil the duty of the powerful revolutionary army of Kim Jong Un in the ongoing sacred struggle to reunify the country and win the final victory in building a thriving nation in the revolutionary spirit of Mt. Paektu under his leadership.
					
					 As the DPRK is having Kim Jong Un at its helm, the might of the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army is growing stronger, the dream and ideal of the Korean people will be translated into a reality and only victory and glory will be in store for the DPRK, they stressed.
					
					 At the end of the meeting, the participants had a cheerful dancing party.

articles.title: Youth and Students Meet
articles.content:
Youth and Students Meet
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- A meeting of youth and students took place at the Central Youth Hall on Thursday on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of holding supreme leader Kim Jong Un at the helm of the Workers' Party of Korea and the state.
					 A report made by Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the C.C., the youth league, was followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said that the reelection of Kim Jong Un as first chairman of the NDC of the DPRK at the 1st Session of the 13th Supreme People's Assembly is a political event to be specially recorded in accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche and the revolutionary cause of Songun started in Mt. Paektu generation after generation and a great jubilee of national history.
					
					 They noted that he has performed feats on behalf of the party and the revolution, the country and its people by steering the struggle to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche at the turning point of history when the new century of Juche started.
					
					 They went on:
					
					 He is putting forward the youth as the scout party for the general advance making a breakthrough in the building of a thriving nation and wisely leading the youth league to creditably fulfill its mission and duty as reliable political reserves of the party.
					
					 Thanks to his great idea on attaching importance to the youth, they could perform miracles and feats, glorifying their worthy life through a fruitful struggle to defend the country and build a thriving nation.
					
					 They vowed to usher in a period of great prosperity of Songun Korea by raising a strong wind of leap forward on all fronts for building a thriving nation under his Songun revolutionary leadership.

articles.title: Workers' Art Group Gives Performance
articles.content:
Workers' Art Group Gives Performance
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- A performance was given by the Workers' Art Group of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) at the Central Hall of Workers to celebrate the 102nd birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Put on the stage were male chorus "Only along Road Desired by the Leader", dialogic poem "Cradle of Love" and other colorful numbers.
					
					 The performers sang high praises of his revolutionary life and the feats the President performed by glorifying the 20th century as a century of victory of the cause of independence against imperialism and the socialist cause with his outstanding idea and extraordinary leadership since he embarked on the revolution in his early years.
					
					 Also put on the stage were a collection of songs "The General Is Our Father" and agitation and drum unison "Push back Frontiers of the Latest Science" and other numbers praising the feats of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Its repertoire included numbers dealing with the loyalty and revolutionary enthusiasm of the Korean people to advance, rallied close around Marshal Kim Jong Un and the noble mental spirit of the Korean workers.
					
					 Among the audience were Hyon Sang Ju, chairman of the C.C., the GFTUK, officials and members of the trade unions and workers.

articles.title: Art Group of C.C., UAWK Performs
articles.content:
Art Group of C.C., UAWK Performs
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- A performance was given by the art group of the C.C., the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea at the Kumdang Cooperative Farm in Onchon County, South Phyongan Province on Thursday to celebrate the 102nd birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The performance began with odes and choruses "Let's Sing of the Day of the Sun" and "Our Unforgettable Leader". Put on the stage were colorful numbers praising the President.
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the feats the President performed by clearly indicating the way of settling the socialist rural question with his original idea and extraordinary leadership and bringing about epoch-making changes in the countryside.
					
					 Also staged were numbers lauding General Secretary Kim Jong Il for making sure that a radical turn was brought about in double cropping and potato farming on the cooperative farms across the country.
					
					 Its repertoire included numbers reflecting the stirring reality of the DPRK making a leap forward under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un and the steadfast faith and will of the army and people of the DPRK to dynamically advance for the final victory in the drive for the building of a thriving nation under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Among the audience were officials concerned, those of the UAWK, and agricultural workers and union members in Onchon County.

articles.title: Art Exhibition of School Youth and Children Held
articles.content:
Art Exhibition of School Youth and Children Held
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- An art exhibition of members of art groups of schoolchildren's palaces and halls and youth halls was held at Pyongyang Schoolchildren's Palace from Monday to Thursday.
					 Exhibited there were more than 400 art pieces of 17 kinds including Korean paintings, oil paintings, crayon paintings, calligraphic works, sculptures and embroidery works created by them.
					
					 Embroidery works "Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia, Immortal Flowers," sketch "With Yearning," oil painting "In the Morning of Day of the Sun" and other works impressively represent the boundless yearning and respect of the school youth and children across the country for President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il who wish Juche Korea a rosy future.
					
					 Exhibits include Korean paintings, crayon paintings, color pencil paintings. They deal with truth that the children have happy today and future thanks to the loving care of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display were works which vividly depict happy and cheerful children growing up to be pillars of thriving Korea and represent the faith and will of the school youth and children to steadfastly make long journeys of the Songun revolution under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: State Industrial Art Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
State Industrial Art Exhibition Opens
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- The State Industrial Art Exhibition opened with due ceremony at the State Industrial Art Exhibition Hall on Thursday to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Displayed at the exhibition are more than 600 designs and industrial art designs personally guided by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 On display there are at least 800 designs, products and models contributed by creators, teachers and students of the Mansudae Art Studio, Korean Industrial Art Studio, provincial industrial art studios, industrial art studios of ministries and national institutions, industrial establishments and universities, and industrial art fans.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were officials concerned, creators, teachers, students and art fans.
					
					 Vice-Premier Kim Yong Jin made an opening address.
					
					 He called upon industrial art creators to create more fresh and peculiar world-famous designs and thus positively contribute to producing goods impeccable in any aspect and favored by the people and goods with world competitiveness.

articles.title: National Martial Art Championship for Mangyongdae Prize Closes
articles.content:
National Martial Art Championship for Mangyongdae Prize Closes
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- The National Martial Art Championship for Mangyongdae Prize closed with due ceremony at the Taekwon-Do Hall on Thursday.
					 It was open on April 3. Players made successes conducive to the development of martial art of the country including Taekwon-Do, the orthodox martial art of the Korean nation.
					
					 The Pyongyang City Taekwon-Do team placed the first in the total points.

articles.title: Visiting Group of Economic Officials of WPK Returns Home
articles.content:
Visiting Group of Economic Officials of WPK Returns Home
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- The visiting group of economic officials of the Workers' Party of Korea returned home on Thursday after visiting China. It is led by Ri Ho Son, vice department director of the Central Committee of the WPK.

articles.title: DPRK Information Committee Delegation Returns Home
articles.content:
DPRK Information Committee Delegation Returns Home
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Information Committee of the DPRK led by Vice-Chairman Jong Tong Hak returned home on Thursday after visiting Singapore and Qatar.

articles.title: Delegation of Koreans in Japan Arrives
articles.content:
Delegation of Koreans in Japan Arrives
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- A delegation of Koreans in Japan led by Ri Ki Sok, advisor to the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, arrived here Thursday to celebrate the Day of the Sun (birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung).

articles.title: Delegation of Koreans in Japan Pays Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Delegation of Koreans in Japan Pays Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il 
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- A delegation of Koreans in Japan led by Ri Ki Sok, advisor to the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Thursday. It arrived here to celebrate the Day of the Sun (birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung).
					 The members of the delegation laid bunches of flowers before the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who devoted their whole lives to achieving the prosperity of the country, bringing about the happiness of the people, strengthening Chongryon and accomplishing the sacred cause of national reunification, and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Delegation of Federation of Koreans in Canada Arrives
articles.content:
Delegation of Federation of Koreans in Canada Arrives
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Federation of Koreans in Canada led by Chairman Kim Su Hae arrived here Thursday on the occasion of the Day of the Sun (birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung).

articles.title: Foreign Artistes, Delegations Here
articles.content:
Foreign Artistes, Delegations Here
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- Artistes and delegations arrived here on Wednesday by air to take part in the 29th April Spring Friendship Art Festival. They were the Academy Ensemble of the Interior Unit of the Russian Ministry of Interior, famous artistes of the Varna Opera Theatre of Bulgaria, a circus of Egypt, art troupe of the National Song and Dance Theatre of Vietnam, a brass band of Finland and a delegation of the Yanbian Research Institute of Culture and Art of China.

articles.title: Foreign Artistes Here
articles.content:
Foreign Artistes Here
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- Foreign artistes arrived here on Thursday to take part in the 29th April Spring Friendship Art Festival.
					 They were the Chinese Art Troupes (the Eastern Song and Dance Ensemble and the Shandong Provincial Circus), the Circus of State Acrobatic Company of Russia, the Song and Dance Ensemble of the Mongolian Army, the Malaysia My Harmonica World Ensemble, the National Dancing Troupe of Belarus, the Dance Troupe of Kiev Dance Theater of Ukraine, the Vienna Wind Instrumental Group of Austria, the Dwiki-Music Group of Indonesia, a Thai magician and his companion, a German cellist of Creusen Concert, a Swiss pop singer, an Italian opera singer and a Cuban guitarist.

articles.title: DPRK Citizens Rejoiced at Kim Jong Un's Reelection as First NDC Chairman
articles.content:
DPRK Citizens Rejoiced at Kim Jong Un's Reelection as First NDC Chairman
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- People in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea are delighted at the news that supreme leader Kim Jong Un was reelected first chairman of the National Defence Commission (NDC) at the 1st Session of the 13th Supreme People's Assembly.
					 Kong Sung Il, manager of the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex, told KCNA: Supreme leader Kim Jong Un has reliably defended the socialist country and the destiny of its people by wisely leading the Songun (military-first) revolution.
					
					 He set forth a new line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force and saw to it that Kim Jong Il's patriotism swept the country.
					
					 Thanks to his wise leadership, the DPRK is successfully maintaining the lineage of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 My complex will make big contributions to building prosperous Korea with increased fertilizer output.
					
					 Kim Won, a worker at Huichon Power Station No. 2, said:
					
					 I extend heartfelt congratulations to the respected Marshal Kim Jong Un on his reelection as first chairman of the NDC.
					
					 He is the tender-hearted father for all the Korean people as he takes warm care of everyone with the politics of love. That's why all of them are following only the Marshal, entrusting their destinies and future to him.
					
					 Hong Hye Ran, a citizen living in Ryanggang Province, said:
					
					 The respected Marshal Kim Jong Un's reelection as first chairman of the NDC guarantees the bright future of the great Paektusan nation.
					
					 Enjoying the performance of the Moranbong Band, we became further convinced that the DPRK is sure to emerge a thriving country in near future as it is guided by him.
					
					 I will work harder to bring bumper harvest in potato farming this year.

articles.title: DPRK Youths Vow to Remain Loyal to Kim Jong Un's Leadership
articles.content:
DPRK Youths Vow to Remain Loyal to Kim Jong Un's Leadership
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- Upon hearing the happy news that Marshal Kim Jong Un was reelected first chairman of the National Defence Commission (NDC) at the 1st Session of the 13th Supreme People's Assembly, young people in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea are hardening their will to remain intensely loyal to his leadership.
					 Jang Hyon Chol, vice-chairman of the C.C., Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, told KCNA:
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un's reelection as the first chairman of the NDC is a noteworthy historic event that guarantees the future of prosperous Korea.
					
					 Now the youths throughout the country are firmly determined to invariably follow his Songun (military-first) leadership in order to bring earlier the day of final victory.
					
					 Taking his reelection as a great pride, they will devote themselves to building a thriving nation.
					
					 Kim Pun Ok, a member of the Paektusan Songun Youth Shock Brigade, said:
					
					 The news of Marshal Kim Jong Un's reelection as the first NDC chairman has put the members of the shock brigade in an ecstasy of joy.
					
					 Kim Jong Un shows deep trust and loving care for the young people so that they can become youth heroes who take the lead in bringing upsurges in all fields.
					
					 True to his intention, we will make innovations one after another in building power stations.
					
					 Kim Myong Nam, chairman of the Tongdaewon District, Pyongyang, Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, said:
					
					 The Korean youth movement has gained further momentum under the seasoned leadership of the respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, who has steadfastly maintained the politics of giving priority to the youths pursued by the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in their lifetime.
					
					 True to Kim Jong Un's intention on hastening the final victory through a revolutionary ideological offensive, we, officials of the youth league, will direct big efforts to making young people fully display their mental power in a drive to glorify Kim Jong Un's era.

articles.title: New Cookeries Presented to Cooking Festival
articles.content:
New Cookeries Presented to Cooking Festival
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- New cookeries were shown at the 19th Cooking Festival held with the approach of the Day of the Sun (April 15).
					 The Okryu Restaurant displayed more than 40 recipes for sturgeon dish and soy source for preparing it. 
					
					 A recipe for ice-cream with green beans and soft bean curd was also presented.
					
					 The Pyongyang Hotel came out with a recipe for processing duck's egg and cooking sweet jelly with yam.
					
					 What caught one's eye were recipes for sausage and jelly with skin of catfish, invented by the Tongchonho Restaurant.
					
					 The Haebangsan Hotel displayed a cookery of making cheese fondue with goat milk and Taedonggang Beer, instead of cow's milk and white wine.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary on S. Korea's Missile Development
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary on S. Korea's Missile Development
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces on April 1 reorganized their guided missile command into a missile command on an extension basis.
					 A person in authority of puppet defence ministry told that the reformation is aimed at expanding the sphere of military operations, confined to the range of guided missiles, to stand against the DPRK's strategic force command.
					
					 Earlier, the warmongers of south Korea opened to public the fact that they conducted a test-fire of ballistic missile with a 500 km range. And they assured that missiles with longer range would be developed next year, which is able to strike any part of the DPRK.
					
					 Such moves clearly show the impropriety of south Korea's missile development as it is aimed to exterminate the fellow countrymen only, catering to the will of foreign forces.
					
					 The south Korean authorities criticized the peaceful satellite launch of the DPRK and regular rocket launching drills by its army as "violation of UN resolutions" and "provocation". Meanwhile, they are speeding up the development and deployment of ballistic missiles at the tacit connivance and instigation of the U.S.
					
					 Advocating the "development of missiles able to strike the whole area of the north", they have got hell-bent on the development of 800 km-range ballistic missile under the U.S. support and deployed cruise missiles with a 1,500 km range.
					
					 At home and abroad, the south Korean authorities malignantly slander the DPRK's self-defensive deterrent and strategic line, calling for "nuclear abandonment" and "change". In the meantime they defend their missile development as a "countermeasure" against the "missile threat" from the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK has possessed diversified missiles of various types to cope with the escalated U.S. moves for a nuclear war against it, but has never regarded the compatriots as their target nor claimed that it would strike the whole area of south Korea.
					
					 The main target of the DPRK's powerful missile forces is the United States bringing the danger of a nuclear war to the Korean nation as well as its aggression forces' bases.
					
					 But, the south Korean warmongers serve as shock forces for the U.S. seeking a war against the DPRK, pulling up it over its self-defensive missiles and stepping up the development of their own missiles targeting the fellow countrymen. This is a shameless and ridiculous action against the nation.
					
					 They should stop their reckless action at once, pondering over the disastrous consequences to be entailed by their missile development.

articles.title: Religionists Suppressed for Protesting against Construction of Naval Base in S. Korea
articles.content:
Religionists Suppressed for Protesting against Construction of Naval Base in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- South Korean police walked away Rev. Kim Song Hwan on April 7 for staging a protest against the construction of a naval base in Sogwipho, Jeju Province, according to the south Korean paper Hangyore.
					 They also arrested Rev. Mun Jong Hyon and several other religionists on charges of disturbance of performance of duties when they protested against it.
					
					 The Kangjong Village Society and other civic organizations of south Korea condemned the police's suppression and demanded an immediate release of those arrested.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries Slammed for Trying to Stamp Out Chongryon
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries Slammed for Trying to Stamp Out Chongryon
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China issued a statement on Mar. 30 denouncing the Japanese authorities for their moves to crack down on Chongryon (General Association of Korean Residents in Japan).
					 The statement said:
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries have taken such brutal actions as escalating the anti-DPRK, anti-Chongryon rackets and persistently committing searches for facilities of Chongryon, violence and arrest against compatriots, etc. and are now working hard to seize even the Korean Hall of Chongryon.
					
					 Their illegal decision to allow the sale of the Korean Hall of Chongryon is a wanton encroachment on the sovereignty of the DPRK as it is aimed at physically removing the center for activities of Chongryon, the champion of the democratic national rights of Koreans in Japan, and stamping out Chongryon and the movement of Koreans in Japan.
					
					 The General Association of Koreans in China and all Koreans in China will never pardon the Japanese reactionaries hell-bent on the moves to suppress and persecute Koreans in Japan and stamp out Chongryon, the inviolable overseas Koreans organization of the DPRK, far from making an apology and reparation for the crimes committed against the Korean nation.
					
					 It strongly demanded Japan, a defeated nation, make a sincere apology and reparation for the crime-woven past history and stop at once the agitation for making Japanese society veer to the Right and rush headlong into militarism, and the persecution and suppression of Koreans in Japan.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Democratic Congo
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Democratic Congo
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "Let Us Uphold Independence" was published in booklet by Cedi Publishing House of DR Congo.
					 The work, made public on September 7, Juche 70 (1981), clarifies that it is the requirement of the present era to maintain independence in the activities of the party and the state and the Juche idea is a man-centered philosophy.
					
					 A book releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on April 2.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Lauded by Personage of DR Congo
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Lauded by Personage of DR Congo
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- Whoever desires the independent development of the country and the prosperity of the nation should regard the work of President Kim Il Sung as a maxim.
					 Jean Mbongopassi, secretary general of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo, said this at a releasing ceremony of Kim Il Sung's work held on April 2.
					
					 He went on to say:
					
					 We live in the era of independence at present.
					
					 The people of African countries including DR Congo attained independence free from the imperialist colonial rule in the past but they are, in actuality, still subject to the fate of neo-colonial slavery forced by imperialists.
					
					 Kim Il Sung's work "Let Us Uphold Independence" clearly indicates a road of genuine independence for us to follow under the present situation and contains a lot of propositions gripping the hearts of the people.
					
					 We should thoroughly apply his work to our realities.

articles.title: Events for Celebrating Day of Sun Held Abroad
articles.content:
Events for Celebrating Day of Sun Held Abroad
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- Events for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun) took place in foreign countries.
					 Meetings, book and photo exhibitions and art performances took place in UK, Mongolia and Romania between March 27 and April 1.
					
					 Displayed on the front walls of the venues of the events were portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Exhibited there were works of Kim Il Sung, books and photos introducing the service personnel and people of the DPRK in the struggle for building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 Speakers including the general secretary of the Central Committee of the New Communist Party of Britain and the general secretary of the Central Committee of the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist) lauded Kim Il Sung as an outstanding leader who made the Korean revolution shine with victory and glory.
					
					 The vice-administrative governor of the Ovorhangay Province of Mongolia said:
					
					 We are significantly celebrating the birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung every year and will positively develop the friendly and cooperative relations with the DPRK in the future, too.
					
					 The director of the Kim Il Sung Kindergarten in Ovorhangay Province said:
					
					 We have held events for celebrating the birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung with splendor as the most important work.
					
					 We will make efforts to let the children know well about the greatness of the President, socialist Korea and the traditional friendly relations between the two countries.
					
					 The chairman of the Romanian Workers' Association said:
					
					 The U.S. is making all sorts of desperate efforts to bring the Korean people to their knees through large-scale nuclear war exercises on the Korean peninsula but is sustaining setbacks only  in face of the wise strategy of supreme leader Kim Jong Un perfectly possessed of the same steel-like courage and grit as Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's.
					
					 We envy very much the Korean people holding the great leader in high esteem.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the meetings held in UK and Mongolia.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Foreign Personages
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Foreign Personages 
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- Lectures and round-table talks took place in Russia, South Africa and Ethiopia between March 26 and April 2 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The chairperson of the "Jongilbong" Russia-Korea Friendship Association of Ulyanovsk Region said that Kim Il Sung was the founder of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK and outstanding leader of the world revolutionary people.
					
					 The DPRK powerfully demonstrated its might before the whole world as a prosperous socialist country under his leadership.
					
					 A secretary of the Ulyanovsk Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation said that the President was a tender-hearted father of the people who devoted his all to the prosperity of the country and the happiness of its people.
					
					 Under his leadership the Korean people could firmly defend the sovereignty of the country and the dignity of the nation and glorify them, he added.
					
					 The chairman of the Karelia-DPRK Friendship Association of Russia said that Kim Il Sung's life was the brilliant one of the revolutionary who devoted his all to the sacred cause of freedom and liberation of the Korean people.
					
					 The chairman of the South African Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism expressed his resolution to expand the ranks of adherents to the Juche idea by further intensifying the work for studying and disseminating the Juche idea, saying that it is the greatest guiding idea.
					
					 A vice-director of an Ethiopian hospital said that the great exploits Kim Il Sung performed by providing excellent free medical care in the DPRK with his love for the people will shine forever.

articles.title: Bulgarian Political Figure Favors Statement of DPRK Foreign Ministry
articles.content:
Bulgarian Political Figure Favors Statement of DPRK Foreign Ministry
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- Atanas Ivanov, honorary chairman of the Bulgarian Communists Union, released a statement supporting the statement of the DPRK Foreign Ministry on April 3.
					 The U.S. is staging the large-scale madcap nuclear war drill in collusion with the south Korean puppet forces to stifle the DPRK, he said, adding:
					
					 What is interesting is that the UN Security Council is keeping mum about the consequences to be entailed by the military drill.
					
					 The UNSC on Mar. 28 held a meeting behind closed doors to denounce the self-defensive rocket-launching drill of the Korean People's Army as "violation of resolutions" and "threats to international peace and security".
					
					 The UNSC is feigning ignorance of the U.S.-south Korea joint military drill threatening peace and security on the Korean peninsula and the region while censuring the justifiable self-defensive military drill of the DPRK as a "threat."
					
					 The U.S. had better bear in mind that the DPRK has tremendous military muscle.
					
					 The DPRK declared that it would not rule out a new form of nuclear test to further bolster up its nuclear deterrence.
					
					 The way out for the U.S. is to stop its imprudent approach towards the warning of the DPRK and ponder over it.
					
					 If such catastrophic situation which no one wishes to see is created on the peninsula, the U.S. will be wholly accountable for it.

articles.title: Japan Denounced for Its Moves to Seize Korean Hall of Chongryon
articles.content:
Japan Denounced for Its Moves to Seize Korean Hall of Chongryon
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- Bulgarian and Bangladeshi organizations issued statements condemning the Japanese authorities for their moves to seize the Korean Hall of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on April 4.
					 The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association said:
					
					 The Japanese authorities have cracked down on Chongryon and on Mar. 24 prodded the Tokyo District Court to make an illegal decision on allowing the sale of the land and building of the Korean Hall of Chongryon.
					
					 The Japanese authorities should bear in mind that the DPRK is a socialist power.
					
					 We bitterly denounce the Japanese authorities for their moves to seize the base of Chongryon's activities, weaken its authority and stamp out the movement of Koreans in Japan.
					
					 The Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy noted:
					
					 Such act of the Japanese authorities is a wanton violation of the dignity and vital rights of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan and a grave encroachment on the sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					 We resolutely condemn such an act and strongly demand the Japanese authorities stop it at once.

articles.title: Bulgarian Bodies Condemn UNSC for Its Unreasonable Behavior
articles.content:
Bulgarian Bodies Condemn UNSC for Its Unreasonable Behavior
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- Bulgarian bodies issued statements denouncing the UN Security Council for its unreasonable behavior on April 2 and 4.
					 The Bulgarian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism said:
					
					 The Korean People's Army conducted its just rocket-launching exercises for self-defence to cope with the U.S.-south Korea joint military drill targeting the DPRK.
					
					 However, the UNSC at a closed-door consultative meeting on Mar. 28 committed an illegal provocative act of "denouncing" the DPRK for its just rocket-launching exercises.
					
					 The UNSC labeled the DPRK's rocket-launching exercises aimed at defending peace as a "violation of resolutions" and "threats to international peace and security", far from condemning the U.S. frantic nuclear war exercises.
					
					 It is clear that the UNSC is joining the U.S. in its moves to increase the danger of a war on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. and its followers will be wholly responsible for the catastrophic consequences to be entailed by their moves for aggression.
					
					 The BulgariaÔºçKorea Friendship Association noted:
					
					 Why on earth is the UNSC shutting its eyes to the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises but regarding the just military exercises of the DPRK as a "threat"?
					
					 The DPRK warned that it would not rule out a new type of nuclear test to further bolster up its nuclear deterrence.
					
					 We bitterly condemn the UNSC for its unreasonable behavior.

articles.title: Pakistani, Ethiopian Bodies Condemn Japan's Anti-Chongryon Campaign
articles.content:
Pakistani, Ethiopian Bodies Condemn Japan's Anti-Chongryon Campaign
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- Pakistani and Ethiopian bodies issued statements denouncing the Japanese authorities' campaign against the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on Mar. 28 and April 1.
					 The Pakistan Labour Federation said:
					
					 On Mar. 24 the Japanese authorities prodded the Tokyo District Court to make an illegal decision on allowing the sale of the land and building of the Korean Hall of Chongryon.
					
					 They are working hard to evade the responsibility for it, saying that it was the "judgment of a judicial organ".
					
					 They are seeking a vicious political purpose to seizing the base for activities of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee and thus weaken the authority of Chongryon and stamp out the movement of Koreans in Japan.
					
					 If they persist in their moves to seize the Korean Hall of Chongryon despite the repeated warnings of the DPRK, they will be wholly responsible for the ensuing consequences.
					
					 The Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea said:
					
					 We can not repress the surging indignation at the Japanese authorities' moves to seize the Korean Hall of Chongryon.
					
					 All facts go to prove how persistently the Japanese authorities are trying to stamp out Chongryon.
					
					 We strongly demand them stop such a base act at once.

articles.title: German Expert Points out U.S. Use of UN Designation Is Illegal
articles.content:
German Expert Points out U.S. Use of UN Designation Is Illegal
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- Dr. Christof Lehmann, an expert of Germany in international affairs, posted an article pointing out that the United States use of the UN designation is illegal on website "NSNBC" on Mar. 28.
					 The article said:
					
					 The military of the DPRK has recently carried out military exercises. 
					
					 The missiles were launched within areas designated as military firing ranges. 
					
					 The UN secretary general said that he "urged the DPRK to cease its ballistic missile activities and focus, together with other countries concerned, on the dialog and diplomacy necessary to maintain regional peace and security".
					
					 The UN secretary general did not comment on the joint U.S.-south Korean Ssang Yong (Double Dragon) amphibious assault field exercise, which aims at preparing U.S. and south Korean forces for an amphibious assault against the DPRK.
					
					 The Ssang Yong field exercise was launched March 27 and ends on April 7, 2014.
					
					 The DPRK's drills are, in other words, a defensive exercise that counters the offensive, U.S.-led Ssang Yong exercise.
					
					 Ssang Yong was launched in continuation of this year's Key Resolve and Foal Eagle exercises.
					
					 It is noteworthy that a Special Forces exercises, Balance Knife, has been added to the Foal Eagle field exercises since 2013.
					
					 Within the context of the U.N. secretary general's one-sided warning against the DPRK's defensive exercises, it is noteworthy that the U.N. secretary general did not use the opportunity to address the United States' illegal use of the U.N. designation for its troops in the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Tiene lugar mitin festivo de Pyongyaneses
articles.content:
Tiene lugar mitin festivo de Pyongyaneses
Pyongyang, 10 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 10 en la Plaza Kim Il Sung el mitin de la ciudad de Pyongyang para festejar la reeleccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un como Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					Participaron Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Kim Ki Nam y otros cuadros directivos del partido y el Estado, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido y el poder, el Consejo de Ministros, entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, los funcionarios de las instituciones de ciencia, educacion, literatura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion y trabajadores, jovenes y estudiantes de la capital.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Kim Ki Nam, miembro del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea. 
					
					El informante dijo que la reeleccion del Mariscal en el cargo cimero del CDN que representa y simboliza la dignidad del pais y el inagotable poderio estatal permitio a la RPDC avanzar vigorosamente y garantizar con firmeza la prosperidad eterna de la Corea de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il. 
					
					El Mariscal estuvo en el severo camino de la revolucion del Songun junto con el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, dijo y agrego que al conducir sabiamente durante dos anos pasados la lucha revolucionaria y la construccion general en el supremo puesto del partido y el Estado, el Mariscal logro relevantes proezas a ser registradas en los anales de la patria. 
					
					El Mariscal presento la nueva linea de desarrollo paralelo de acuerdo con la situacion creada y la demanda de la revolucion coreana en desarrollo y estuvo en la marcha forzada a la manera de la guerrilla para la defensa de la patria, recordo y enfatizo que gracias a su incesante inspeccion al frente se han manifestado a todo el mundo la dignidad independiente y el impetu invencible de la potencia del monte Paektu. 
					
					El Mariscal abrio la nueva era de prosperidad diciendo que los suenos e ideales del pueblo coreano son realizar el anhelo del Presidente Kim Il Sung y del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, ratifico.
					
					Por ultimo, llamo a todos a unirse como un solo hombre en torno al Mariscal y marchar a pasos firmes para realizar los suenos e ideales hermosos del pueblo. 
					
					Acto seguido, hubo discursos de felicitacion en representacion de la clase obrera, los trabajadores agricolas, intelectuales y jovenes y estudiantes.
					
					Los oradores dieron la maxima gloria y las mas calurosas felicitaciones al Mariscal y exhortaron a crear meritos y proezas en todos los puestos de trabajo.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales del embajador hungaro
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales del embajador hungaro
Pyongyang, 10 de abril (ACNC) -- Gabor Csaba presento este jueves en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae ante Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, sus cartas credenciales que le acreditan como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica de Hungria en Corea.
					Tras recibirlas Kim departio con el representante diplomatico.

articles.title: MINFAP festeja reeleccion de Kim Jong Un como Primer Presidente de CDN
articles.content:
MINFAP festeja reeleccion de Kim Jong Un como Primer Presidente de CDN
Pyongyang, 10 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 10 el mitin del Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares para festejar la reeleccion del Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Kim Jong Un, como Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					Asistieron al mitin los funcionarios del MINFAP. 
					
					Hubo informe e intervenciones. 
					
					En reflejo de unanime alma de todos los oficiales y soldados del EPC, los oradores dedicaron la maxima gloria y las mas calidas felicitaciones al Mariscal reelegido como Primer Presidente del CDN de la RPDC por la voluntad y deseo de todo el partido, todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo. 
					
					Apuntaron que nadie podra detener el avance de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias, guiadas por el Comandante Supremo, mejor en la ideologia, la capacidad directiva, la inteligencia militar y la audacia y sera radiante el porvenir de la RPDC llena de vigor juvenil. 
					
					Manifestaron la decision de cumplir satisfactoriamente el deber del poderoso ejercito revolucionario de Kim Jong Un en la lucha de hoy por lograr la reunificacion de la patria y la victoria final de construccion de un Estado prospero con el espiritu revolucionario del monte Paektu y bajo la guia del Comandante Supremo. 
					
					Apuntaron que gracias a tener al Mariscal en el supremo puesto de la RPDC, se consolidara cada dia mas el poderio del ejercito revolucionario sin rival del monte Paektu, se haran realidad los suenos e ideales del pueblo coreano y siempre habra victorias y glorias en el porvenir de la patria.
					
					Terminado el mitin, los participantes bailaron con jubilo.

articles.title: Tiene lugar acto festivo de jovenes y estudiantes
articles.content:
Tiene lugar acto festivo de jovenes y estudiantes
Pyongyang, 10 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar este jueves en la Casa Central de la Juventud el acto festivo de los jovenes y estudiantes dedicado al 2o aniversario de la eleccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un en el cargo supremo del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Estado. 
					El presidente del Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, Jon Yong Nam, presento el informe de la ocasion y hubo discursos.
					
					Los oradores senalaron que la reeleccion del Mariscal como Primer Presidente del CDN de la RPDC en el primer periodo de sesiones de la XIII Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema es un gran jubilo nacional y acontecimiento historico para el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche, la del Songun, iniciada en la selva del monte Paektu. 
					
					Enumeraron que cuando se inicia la nueva centuria del Juche, el Mariscal realizo proezas ante el partido, la revolucion, la patria y el pueblo poniendose al frente de la lucha por el cumplimento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche. 
					
					El presenta a los jovenes como patrullas de marcha general que abren la ruta de avance en la construccion de un Estado prospero y conduce sabiamente para que la UJS cumpla con su mision y deber como destacamento politico de reserva del partido, destacaron. 
					
					Gracias a la gran idea del Mariscal de dar importancia a la juventud, los jovenes coreanos crean milagros y meritos en la defensa de la patria y en la construccion de un Estado prospero, apuntaron.
					
					Expresaron la decision de registrar saltos en todos los sectores de la construccion de un Estado prospero, en acato a la guia del Mariscal sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun, y abrir asi la era de prosperidad de la Corea del Songun.
